error.loadClassrooms: Failed to load classrooms. Please try again.

noResults.search: No classrooms found matching your search.
noResults.noSchedules: No schedules available. Please add schedules for the classes.

emptyState.noClassesForSelectedTime: No classes scheduled for the selected time

recording.page_description: Manage and record session videos from your webcam
recording.no_recordings: No videos have been recorded yet. Press the "Start New Recording" button to begin.

instructions.title: Instructions:
instructions.step1: Select recording mode: Webcam or Screen.
instructions.step2: Grant camera/screen and microphone access when prompted by the browser.
instructions.step3: Adjust video quality settings if needed.
instructions.step4: Press the "Start" button to begin recording.
instructions.step5: You can record multiple videos simultaneously.
instructions.step6: Press "Stop" to finish recording and review the video.
instructions.step7: Press "Download" to save the video to your device.
instructions.note_1: This feature works best on the latest versions of Chrome, Edge, or Firefox.
instructions.note_2: When recording the screen, you can choose to record the entire screen, an application window, or a specific tab.

error.download_failed: Could not download video. Please try again.
error.https_required: MediaDevices API requires HTTPS or localhost to work. Please access the site via HTTPS.
error.api_unavailable_warning: MediaDevices API is not available in this environment
error.api_unavailable_error: Your browser does not support or has blocked the MediaDevices API. Please ensure you are using a modern browser and allow camera access.
error.permission_denied: You have denied camera access. Please grant permission in your browser settings to use this feature.
error.permission_prompt_failed_warning: Could not trigger camera permission prompt:
error.no_camera_found: No camera found. Please ensure a camera is connected and working.
error.device_list_inaccessible: Could not access the device list. Please ensure you have granted camera permissions.
error.check_permissions_error: Error while checking permissions and devices:
error.general_permission_check_error: An error occurred while checking device access permissions.
error.recorder_unsupported: Your browser does not support the MediaRecorder API. Please use a more modern browser.
error.permission_denied_camera_mic: You have denied camera/microphone access. Please grant permission in your browser settings.
error.device_not_found: No camera or microphone was found on your device.
error.device_in_use: Your camera or microphone is currently in use by another application.
error.overconstrained_error: Your device cannot meet the recording requirements. Please check your settings.
error.blob_creation_failed: Could not process the recorded video.
error.recording_error: An error occurred during recording. Please try again.
error.start_recording_unknown_error: Could not start recording. An unknown error occurred.
error.screen_unsupported: Your browser does not support screen recording. Please use the latest version of Chrome, Edge, or Firefox.
error.screen_permission_denied: You have denied screen recording permission.
error.start_screen_recording_failed: Could not start screen recording. An unknown error occurred.
error.stop_recording_failed: Could not stop recording due to an error. Please try again or reload the page.
